exhibition_title: Degas and America: The Early Collectors
exhibition_description: This exhibition examined the early response to Degas in America and was the first to investigate this under-explored chapter in Degasâ€™ critical fortunes. It included about 75 works in all media that were either exhibited or acquired in America toward the end of the 19th century or in the early part of the 20th century. A catalogue accompanied the exhibition.
